title: Everybody loves Sepp! The peloton celebrates the new Vuelta a España champion: ‘No one deserves it more than him’
content:
Reactions from Geraint Thomas, Juan Ayuso, Jumbo-Visma staffers and teammates on Kuss and his historic win: 'Everyone is super happy to see him win.'

Read the full article at Everybody loves Sepp! The peloton celebrates the new Vuelta a España champion: ‘No one deserves it more than him’ on Velo.
author: ahood
